title: Face verification
subtitle: TensorFlow/Keras (Python) | FFmpeg
text: Fine-tuning VGG16 model to verify certain person out of YouTube video using VideoQuotes database as a training dataset.

title: VideoQuotes
subtitle: Spring Boot (Java) | Vue.js | Node.js | Docker | GitHub Actions
text: Deployed at yoga1290.github.io/VideoQuotes; may take < a min to wake up under free Heroku tire

title: H5Recorder
subtitle: Node.js | FFmpeg | NPM | Phantom.js
text: NPM package that generates videos based on query-string parameters passed to a template webpage & merges it w other resources based on color keys
